fields.value: Milton Friedman and U.S. Monetary History: 1961-2006

authorAffiliation.value: Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis

dsDescriptionValue.value: This paper, using extensive archival material from several countries, brings together scattered information about Milton Friedman's views and predictions regarding United States monetary policy developments after 1960 (i.e., the period beyond that covered by his and Anna Schwartz's Monetary History of the United States). The author evaluates these interpretations and predictions in light of subsequent events.
